issue.title: [Doc][Java] Document how dictionary encoding works
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17811](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17811). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ValueVector documentation does not include any discussion of dictionary encoding. There is example code on the IPC page https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/java/ipc.html, but it doesn't provide an overview.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17811?focusedCommentId=17610684) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14213
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14213>
